name: Greedseeker
description:
Collect all gold and bring it with you to next dungeon level. Deeper you go, harder it is to obtain gold.

Greedseeker is 2.5D puzzle platformer made for Ludum Dare 48 game jam in 48h.

Controls: WSAD and Mouse

Everything was made by me from scratch except font.

Tools used: Unity, Blender, Adobe Photoshop, Audacity, Bosca Ceoil
